name: Speed Packing
description:
Pack strangely shaped packages into the back of a truck as quick and tight as you can!  
You could try to get a high score OR pack the box as tightly as possible.  You may alternatively choose to use it as a drawing method or a clicker game.  It's your choice ;)

Credits:

  • Curtis Jensen - Lead Designer, Developer
  • Hayden Maeser - Developer
  • Mason Nielsen - Developer
  • Juan Pablo Martinez - Artist, Developer
  • Trayson Lancaster - Music ("20 mg of drugs" https://soundcloud.com/trayson/20mg-of-drugs)
  • Carlos Alvarado
  • Daniel Aranibar - Main Box Button
